entry.title: Bypass the Network Authentication with DNS Tunnelling

link.title: Bypass the Network Authentication with DNS Tunnelling

entry.summary: Data through port *53* is not intercepted, and the authentication system can be bypassed using the DNS channel.

entry.title: Perform selective jamming of Wi-Fi networks and clients with mdk3(DoS attack on APs/clients)

link.title: Perform selective jamming of Wi-Fi networks and clients with mdk3(DoS attack on APs/clients)

entry.summary: *mdk3* is used for **stress testing 802.11 networks(wifi)**. It consists of various methods by which we can perform tests. Some of major method sare beacon flooding, deauthentication, WPA-dos etc...

entry.title: Is Telegram really anonymous & "focus on privacy" as it advertises? IM software comparison

link.title: Is Telegram really anonymous & "focus on privacy" as it advertises? IM software comparison

entry.summary: Now, more and more people wants to be anonymous. Telegram, an IM known as *"focus on security and privacy"*, is chosen. But, does Telegram really "focus on security and privacy" as it advertises? After comparing Telegram with other IM software. I'll show you different softwares' advantages and disadvantages, and help you decide which one to choose.

entry.title: Solve Qt: libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile

link.title: Solve Qt: libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile

entry.summary: libpng is more stringent about checking ICC profiles than previous versions. In Qt, if you use certain formats of PNG images, you may get a warning 'libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile', though this will not affect the compilation.
